gt_text: 冬季装备上新 新季新品来袭！冬季装备最高5折 为冰雪而生 本周免运费 立即购买
juding_criteria:

*   Title "冬季装备上新" (in bold, uppercase sans-serif letters, top left, angled slightly)
*   Cartoon figures snowboarding
*   Cartoon figures skiing
*   Snowy mountain
*   Snow goggles (scattered around a lodge)
*   Boots (scattered around a lodge)
*   Helmets (scattered around a lodge)
*   Lodge
*   Red ribbon banner with text "新季新品来袭!" (above the title)
*   Bold black stamp-style text "冬季装备最高5折" (below the title)
*   Circular logo (top right corner)
*   Text "为冰雪而生" (bottom content)
*   Text "本周免运费" (bottom content)
*   "立即购买" badge with arrow icon (bottom content)
